Description of incident: "A northeastern Illinois hospital has experienced a data breach that exposed patient information of up to 9,000 people.Officials of Silver Cross Hospital in New Lenox said there's no evidence showing any unauthorized people gained access to the data."Silver Cross Hospital recently learned that a vendor that manages parts of its website experienced a data incident that affected the information of certain Silver Cross patients and others," hospital officials said on its website."Names, Social Security numbers, health insurance information, addresses, birth dates were compromised
